tooltip.infinitystones.tnt_sword: Explodes on impact, right-click to detonate at range
tooltip.infinitystones.wormhole_generato: Creates a wormhole to teleport to distant locations
tooltip.infinitystones.chaos_stone: Creates chaotic effects in the area around you
tooltip.infinitystones.magic_mirror: Shift-click to save location, right-click to teleport back
tooltip.infinitystones.weather_staff: Control the weather in your world
tooltip.infinitystones.gravity_manipulat: Manipulate gravity in the surrounding area
tooltip.infinitystones.enhanced_command_: Execute commands without needing creative mode
